mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ST='Y', SECESSION_CD = #{choice}, SECESSION_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NAME, S_NM, S_CYCLE FROM SUBS_ORDER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN SUBS USING(S_CD) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND S_CANCEL = 'N' GROUP BY S_ORDER_CD,MEMBER_NAME, S_NM, S_CYCLE, S_DT ORDER BY S_DT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT P_ORDER_CD, MEMBER_NAME, P_PAY_DT,TOTAL_PRICE, P_ORDER_NM,P_ORDER_PHONE,P_ORDER_ADDR,P_DL_REQ FROM PRODUCT_ORDER JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_PAY USING(P_ORDER_CD) WHERE P_ORDER_CD = ${orderNo}

SELECT P_ORDER_CD, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_PRICE, OPTION_PRICE, OPTION_NM, DELIVERY_ST, OPTION_COUNT, IMG_RENAME FROM PRODUCT_ORDER JOIN OPTION_TB USING(P_ORDER_CD) JOIN OPTION_TYPE USING(OPTION_CD) JOIN PRODUCT ON(OPTION_TYPE.P_CD = PRODUCT.P_CD) JOIN PRODUCT_DELIVERY USING(DELIVERY_CD) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG ON(PRODUCT.P_CD = PRODUCT_IMG.P_CD) WHERE P_ORDER_CD = ${orderNo}
